name: The Harbinger (Stev51)
description:
Last night, a prophet came to you in a dream. It told you that you are going to die.
You have 24 hours left to live. You know that this is certain.
How will you spend your final day? What decisions will you make? Can you prevent your determined fate?

The Harbinger is a tiny horror game about preventing your predetermined murder. Gameplay is point-and-click. It takes 10-15 minutes to complete.

This is my first time publishing a completed game, despite wanting to be a game developer for years! Expect something very unpolished and basic. Hopefully my next game will be an improvement. :)

IMPORTANT: You need an internet connection to run this game! It uses online resources and will crash if it can't load them.

Music credit: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio. Tracks used are Is it Too Late? and Evil Behind the Mask.
